title: Tracking Error: Daily vs Monthly
text:
Let \(a_t = r_{p,t} - r_{b,t}\) be active returns for the period \(t\).
The sample tracking error is: \[
\widehat{TE}
= \sqrt{\frac{1}{T-1}\sum_{t=1}^{T}(a_t-\bar a)^2},\quad
\bar a=\frac{1}{T}\sum_{t=1}^{T}a_t.
\]
Annualization under IID: \[
TE_{\text{ann}} = TE_{\text{period}} \sqrt{N},
\] with (N=252) (daily) or (12) (monthly). In practice, serial correlation means monthly-from-daily isn’t just a rescale.

title: Tracking Error: Daily vs Monthly
text:
Quick Code Demo
import numpy as np, pandas as pd np.random.seed(0) days = 756 a = np.random.normal(0, 0.001, days) df = pd.DataFrame({‘a’: a}) te_daily = df[‘a’].std(ddof=1) te_ann = te_daily * (252**0.5) te_ann
